title: Job Demand-Based Language Learning Competency Strengthening Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Proficiency and Comprehension of Job-Related Terminology
context.additional_context: Providing job-linked, practice-centered education aimed at enhancing language proficiency for current professionals

learning_goals: Learners accurately use 50 job-relevant language expressions in professional contexts
Learners can set three or more personalized learning objectives based on job requirement analysis.
Learners can improve language learning effectiveness by 20% or more by applying two or more self-directed learning strategies that promote achievement motivation.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
